title: Pather Panchali
overview: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work. Alone, his wife Sarbojaya looks after her rebellious daughter Durga and her young son Apu, as well as Harihar's elderly cousin Indir.
awards: Cannes Film Festival - Best Human Document
